books.title: Eat & Run
books.description: Eat & Run: My Unlikely Journey to Ultramarathon Greatness is a 2012 autobiography by the ultramarathon champion Scott Jurek and Steve Friedman. It was published by Houghton Mifflin Harcourt on June 5, 2012.

reviews.title: GREAT READ!!
reviews.content: Loved the book! Started eating vegan after and I feel amazing!

reviews.title: running is dumb
reviews.content: book was stupid AF.  running sucks. eat more meat!

reviews.title: Scott Jurek is the man!!
reviews.content: book was very inspiring loved hearing more about Scott's life!!
